content.detailedDescription:
We were off the templin hwy north exit at one of our favorite fishing creeks, simply sitting in our truck anticipating the sunrise so we can start our hike to catch fish.The glowing lights in the night sky caught my attention but there was enormous denial for very long.When i first noticed it, i believe i was in shock, denial .Hypnotized state.???
at first notice, i very foolishly believed it was a blimp......Lol...Right over my head, moving with zero sound and what was a mother ship at that.Far too massive than we humans are capable of.Many ,many glowing lights of many colors and shapes moving ,hovering close and very slowly above our heads.Looking back, i can easily say i was in denial of what i saw.The ship slowly went passed us or did it take us?????   i welcome hypnosis , tests or regression therapy to bring this to light.
content.summary: A very large craft .Very huge as it hovered over us and moved in path for minutes on.I never questioned it or became conscious until realized this craft made zero noise.

content.detailedDescription: My 14 years old michelangelo went for hollydays to trento, north of italy and have taken and sent to me a picture where i immediately observed a shadow on the air flying of the mountain. i kindly asked you to analyse my picture to verify if effectively is an ovni or ufo. thanks a lot.
content.summary: My 14 years old michelangelo sent a picture taken by him where i appreciated or remarked an object like anovni on the air.

content.detailedDescription: I received this pic from a friend of a friend that was deer hunting up on the missouri river.  i myself [plus multiple witnesses] have had 7 "orange orb" sightings over pacific, mo since 2009, some stationary, some moving [single], some moving in formations [delta].  all silent, all absolutely the wrong color to be flying in us airspace.  i'm a quality inspector for boeing and have worked on or near fighter jets, and military/civilian airbases since 1980 and have never seen the likes of the orange orbs.  the attached pic i received from my friend was so intriguing i felt compelled to post it to mufon to see if anyone else witnessed these objects.  according to the person i received the pic from, his friend and another guy were making their way back to the boat ramp after a day of deer hunting along the missouri river.  the sun had set approx. 15 mins. earlier.  looking at the bottom of the clouds in the pic you can tell that the sun is reflecting off the bottom of the cloud.  this may be just a very cool sun dog-type reflection, but i was having a hard time explaining the chevron shaped group of lights above the cloud, and the 'way too evenly spaced' beams of light coming off what appears to be the sun shining down from the cloud.  notice that the beams are apparently reflecting off the river.  apparently the event only lasted seconds and was gone, but i haven't talked to the person that took the pic personally.  the "orange orb" events i mentioned earlier were witnessed by multiple people, but are not documented with pictures, and a completely different event[s].  i'm unsure if the person that took the pic would be willing to talk to anyone about it, but i could ask if you'd like to get more details about the event.
content.summary: Pic taken from a boat on the missouri river

content.detailedDescription:
Driving my renault kangoo to dobrich, i turned in front of the asaid car at general kiselovo on the dobrich road( car type that ive never seen before )- registration number twn 365 / strange manufacture insignia of manufacture /driver wearing a strange helmet type of head set or sunglasses. my observation of the driver he was massive ( over wieght or obese with double chin) this car followed me for several miles and many times 'tail gated' me, untill on the approach to a village called vedrina, where he nearly collided with the back of my car.  i challenged his m.O. with hazard warning lights and break lights. he then backed off to 50 yards and a 'blue flash' occured, at first i thought it was traffic police pulling me over, but, there was no car at all. the car cmpltely dissappeared into thin air. i immediately pulled over to comply, but the car car dissappeared into thin air and no other traffic was on the road.  i did stop right away and walked up the road for a kilometer and there are no roads off the road we were travelling, only freshly ploughed felds.  i smelled a strong smell of ozone when i got out of my car.  and the 'blue flash reflected in all 3 rear view mirrors, which led me to believe it was a police agent stopping me for a spot check.  

i reseached the registration number and it does not exsist, the closest i can find id u.S. army ????

all i have reported on is, as true in detail and accuracy as possible.
thanking you and hope this helps you some how.

graham bird bulgaria ( ex london)
content.summary: Car dissappears behind me with a blue flash

content.detailedDescription: I am an aspiring astrophysicst and on one of my nights observing the night sky, between the constellation taurus and the star capella there were 2 star-like objects in the sky i was trying to recognize in the sky map. while i was looking in that region of the sky, i saw these two objects exchange their positions in about 2 seconds. i saw them move swiftly but they must have moved at a great speed since they were at such large distances from each other as they appeared like a star. now i too believe in proofs and evidences and i know this incident doesn't have any since it happened very quickly. i have tried to figure out ever since what actually happened there. but i know one thing for sure that what i saw was not an illusion. it happened and it's been kicking my imagination on crazy levels. i just need some help on analyzing this event further and clear my doubts.
content.summary: There were two point objects in the sky which exchanged their places in 2 seconds. it was a swift and fast motion.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pics of the moon which i do often. there were clouds but sperradic and i like the effect clouds have in front of the moon. when i saw these sphere like shapes two maybe three crossing path of moon from right to left. i observed moon for about an hour..Really don't know how long they were there i did not notice them really till they were starting to cross in front of moon..  i thought maybe a cloud or a drone but it was way to high and seemed to have a solid form.
content.summary: Sphere like shapes crossing in front of moon

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the clouds as i searched for airplanes and did my usual report of the chemtrails in my area, noticed a strange cloud and zoomed in with the mobile phone to try to see better but due to the bright sunlight could not see the screen and only after reviewing the images on the computer did i notice that i had in fact filmed something similar to other secret projects like the tr3b or sr91 aurora or similar. i send the original video, the link of my youtube page as well as copies in slow motion and some photos with filter applied. i'm not sure but i was left with the feeling that there are more objects next to the triangular object. you will have to analyze better.Good news and your answer.Carlos vieira.
content.summary: Triangular object is cloaked in clouds

content.detailedDescription: Cigar type ufo 3 pulsating lights
content.summary: This ufo was spotted by my brother. it was very real and effected him and his friend very!! deeply and gave them a new perspective on life and what we know. my uncle has amassing photos and story's of ufo sightings only 6km away from this one this place w

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my couch playing a video game when out of the corner of my eye i see what looked like an extremely bright star fly pass my house. it came and went in a matter of seconds. i was so shocked by what i had just saw i yelled out "what the hell!". i knew it couldn't have been a plane because of how fast it went. it flew an absolutely straight path. i lost sight of it when flew behind the trees.
content.summary: Brightest and fastest thing i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I've been seeing ufos in lakewood for years. they usually have pulsating lights that change colors, and they usually change locations slowly throughout the night. but sometimes they move away shortly after i start recording video on my phone, almost like they know. lol

the last few nights i've seen the same ufo in the same general area. usually stationary. sometimes it's just a orange or white ball of light, other times it changes between red and blue, and it blinks really fast while it's changing colors. it also looks like it's changing shape while it's flashing between red and blue.

i live in lakewood by artesia high school, the ufo was up in the sky over the riverbed area by the city of la palma, or even further.

the other ufos i always see are in the opposite direction. they are over lakewood for sure, they can be seen when you look up towards the pioneer blvd and studebaker rd area. one of them has been here for the past 5 years at least, i've been seeing it almost every night for as long as i can remember. i've even seen it get chased by a helicopter one time.

this is the first time i reported a sighting, but they literally happen just about every night where i live. i've gotten used to it so i don't really try to take any pics or video anymore, i usually just wave at them or throw up the peace sign and say what's up.

anyways, happy thanksgiving to everyone out there. happy holidays, and may we all be blessed and find what we're looking for in life.

peace out
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my parents house with my two young children, we were heading home. i noticed something flying over their neighbors house. it  began to move towards my parents house at a very slow rate. i thought it was possibly a farming airplane, since they live in the country. i heard no noise and noticed it was shaped like no other airplane i have seen. as it passed my vehicle i noticed it was triangle shape and had three lights. while passing the object i got a little light headed, nothing major, but i did feel odd.  i called my mom to see if she could see the aircraft . she headed outside immediately. she didn't see anything or hear anything. i turned my vehicle around to see if it was still visible. i drove in the direction it was heading and i could no longer see the flying object.
content.summary: Parents live in the country and left their house approximately 8:15. i saw a air craft hovering over their house, then it slowly moved towards my parents house. i then called my mom telling her a air craft was flying low. she went outside and saw nothing.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out north bedroom window noticed unusual yellow white strobe with steady red in very close proximity flying from north to southwest.Right when i noticed it it stopped went back north then forward to southwest it would hover and jerk back and forth like it noticed me then continued southwest till out of veiw, well below cloud layer these guys can be deceptive but it gave me a happy its ok feeling.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked out nort bedroom window observed from north  heading southwest unusual bright yellow white strobe and close red steady light way below cloud level overing going forward and back and forth then out of veiw

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling home from work at just after midnight, i observed lights in the sky off to my right. the lights were observed after leaving the city of bath (united kingdom) i was travelling on the a4 (bristol road) heading towards the village of saltford (united kingdom) riding a 100cc motorcycle, a journey of 4 - 5 miles that would take about 10 minutes to complete. as i continued towards saltford, i was still observing the lights. as i arrived at the saltford, i was able to observe that the object was almost directly above me.

 i was able to observe that the object was made of 4 lights, 3 outer and 1 inner, the three outer lights were white in colour, continuous and formed a triangular shape, the inner light was central to the other 3, flashing at regular intervals and of a deep red colour (almost as deep as fresh blood colour). the object travelled from my right to left in a direction roughly from the north to south at a speed i estimate no faster than 10 - 20mph. there was no discernable noise from the object which i estimate was no higher than 500 feet above my position at the closest. i continued my journey and had no further sighting of the object.
content.summary: Travelling from bath, england i observed lights to my right, getting closer i saw the object was triangular in shape

content.detailedDescription: Ufo encounter(s) thru june 2017ate sep.2017 experienced same object on different times and nights.Object had connected with other object and appeared to come twords me.It had been video over several occasion and i feel it knew its being video and followed..Wich in return it contacted me letting me know that it knows we have communicated
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Ufo seems to know i been video followimg it

content.detailedDescription: I've seen quite a few ufos and think i've been possible visited. a saucer, a huge camouflaged triangle, a huge white orb cover the moon and go across the sky, an orange orb in my bach yard and more. all in idaho falls area. people just don't look up.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Orange orb on bush, huge triangle while camping, huge white saucer, others

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at my front door, seeing my mother out when i happened to look up and noticed the red lights. there were a few but not many clouds in the sky that night.

at first i thought it was a helicopter (due to the rotating lights) then i realised there are no lights on the end of rotor blades and they were not fast enough to be on rotors (the red lights i saw spun at about 1 second for a full rotation). they also seemed too close together to be at the ends of blades. the object moved at too fast a speed to be a helicopter and seemed to be a little high to be one too. 

it was only in my vision for about 30 seconds but moved in a very fast, straight line. as it was getting dark outside i didn't see any vehicle/craft so assumed it was black/dark itself. i also did not see any discernible shape except for the 3 red lights that i would say were a triangle formation. these lights themselves, as well as moving forward with the craft, turned in a clockwise direction.

the area i saw the object was a quiet area and i noticed there was no noise from it at all and i know the sound of helicopters as the area i live now has almost daily helicopters in the sky. 

i stared at it for a few seconds then pointed up and asked my mother ''what is that?!!'' but she didn't see it as by the time she realised what was going on and looked up, it had vanished, either into or above the cloud. it made me feel really uneasy and did not sleep very well that night. it happened a good few years ago but i will never forget how it looked or how it made me feel.
content.summary: Fast moving object with lights spotted above. night sky, no 'craft' seen just 3 red lights rotating in clockwise direction.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside a woooden house then standing with. y nose touching the glass window looking into the lounge room scaring the kind with short dark hair holding a pillow screaming then next minute he dream four figures one was a tall tin like gray the other looked just like kenny from south park the forth one couldn’t make vegimitie samwitch the first was a extremely dark entity prior to waking was on a surgery table going down a hall with lights in my eyes and ceiling lights going passed. there whisel's sounded like if they had water in their mouths when they did it but they didn’t have mouths.
content.summary: It was invisible but it’s way was there.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from getting a pop it was 7:03 in the morning indiana eastern time november 22nd 2017 i look to the left which was west and then i seen a couple blowing lights like fire but no flickering just a steady light.  i sat there and other cars pulled up but did not see them i pulled over to take pictures or get video that did not have them with me i was so mad i continue to watching them until they all disappeared to the south.
content.summary: There are about 10 to 15 lights and the lights were the color of a actual fire reddish orange first pulled up to a s they were coming from west going south i stayed there and watched first i seen to the next thing i know there was 10 to 15 of them.

content.detailedDescription: 2 friends and i were spending father's day having a bonfire on a beach in santa cruz. it was around 3 am when we decided to go home. as we were leaving we past a homeless man who was walking onto the beach. as we past this man, he pointed to the sky and asked us "what's that?". we all turned to look, and when we seen what he was pointing at we froze. there was a faint fireball coming straight out of the sky. i was raised by an astronomer so at first i thought it was a comet. but, as it got closer it stopped. the flames vanished and i could see this cylindrical metal craft with white lights around the bottom. it looked like a metal toilet paper roll. the craft bottom started to close, like a cartoon satellite opening. as it did that, the shape turned into a disc. almost as if the toilet paper roll had been compressed. it got longer and shorter, i could see a window form at the top that appeared to go 360 degrees around the craft. the lights went out and the craft turned into a bubble. i could see stars behind it, but i could see the reflection of the city lights. the craft started floating north up the coast. we walked to the car keeping an eye on this bubble craft thing. we followed it for about 10 minutes before we lost sight of it. scariest day of my life. i still tear up and get anxiety when i think about it. we are not alone in this universe, i am now a true believer.
content.summary: Fireball turned into space craft, not a single sound

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were looking at the stars and one "star-like light" was stationary then quickly went south and then goes behind a cloud and you could still see the light through the cloud and when it got out a tree was in my way so i couldn't see it anymore and when i moved to keep it in view i couldn't find it anymore. (me and my friend saw the same exact thing) i told him to record right when we noticed it and he tried but the light was too far so the camera didn't catch it. i started crying after because i was in shock.
content.summary: Star like light moving very fast south

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling in the car, looked up and saw a triangular shaped object with 3 really bright lights on. it was so close to the ground, came over head, changed direction and headed over the fields near where i live. definitely wasn't a plane you could make out the dullness and the triangular shape inside the lights.
content.summary: Traveling in my car, looked up saw a triangular shaped craft coming from one direction then changed. slight humming and very dark.

content.detailedDescription: i was at home in the backyard talking with my wife.I noticed it first by the reflection on the lake and looked up .I could not comprehend it as it happened so fast my wife did not see it.Never saw anything like it before.It looked like a pod craft sort of suv shaped.It headed nw maybe 500 ft up or more.Speed constant at 100-200 plus mph.It happened quickly .I was awe struck and could not react fast enough to point it out to my wife.Lost sight of it within 20 seconds.
content.summary: Brilliant glow of red/maroon with highlights.Light reflected off of lake griffin.Looked like black light poster glow.

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:00 pm to 10:00 pm on the night of november 21, 2017 me and my brother witnessed a large disc-shaped object hovering above the clouds in a nnw direction.  at first i thought it was a star but being an amateur astronomer and astrophysics enthusiast, i realized that the light wasn't blinking or shimmering- it was spinning.  i looked closer and realized i wasn't looking at a single point of light but a circle of lights (multi-colored with blue, green, red, and white).  at that point i grabbed my brother who was standing nearby and pointed it out to him.  he saw it without me telling him what to look for. after pointing out the spinning lights, i then noticed a dim outline around the spinning lights that was only a little lighter than the sky (like it was camouflaged or highly reflective).  as we sat and watched it for a few minutes, we noticed that it hadn't moved an inch in the entire time we'd been standing there.  i tried to record the event with my phone but the object did not show up on camera (however the neighboring star did!) which struck me as very odd.  shortly thereafter, my brother proceeded inside while i felt an overwhelming compulsion to stare at the object, almost as if i were hypnotized.  after about 3 more minutes, i also proceeded inside.  in total, our sighting lasted about 7-9 minutes and the object was still there when i left.
content.summary: It just stayed there spinning.  i felt slightly hypnotized by it.  very high up but very clear

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hampshire street there was a white tear drop object that was traveling fast and it disappeared behind the market it was the strangest thing i have seen. then there was a dark colored helicopter in the area. it kept circling the area. i'm kind of scared.
content.summary: A white tear drop dissipated at the address

content.detailedDescription:
On 27th october 2017 driving southward from huercal overa to turre on the a7/e15 at aprox 11-11.30 am at 50mph i noticed a white arrow shaped whispy cloud suddenly appear in a clear clear blue sky at approx 45 degrees to my position. distance from me impossible to tell. the cloud stated to disperse westward and revealed a round shining ball the size of an asprin. as i watched the cloud disappeared as fast  as it had appeared and the shining ball which seemed stationary for a brief moment just got smaller until it was out of sight altogether.
as i was on the motorway with fast moving traffic i was unable to stop , take photos or more accurate compass readings. it was nothing on my windsheild as the car had been in the car wash 1 hour earlier.
i felt quite elated as this was my third ufo sighting, my first being in papua new guinea wher i had to fill in enough forms in triplicate and suffer  stupid remarks from an australian agent i vowed not to report any further sightings, and my second sighting which was in spain and was later reported in the local newspaper by over 200 persons.
content.summary: Observed  in clear blue sky from car while travelling on a7 just passed vera turnoff

content.detailedDescription: I came up from down stairs around 5-8pm afther i watch a tv/movie with my mom when i saw a orb out side my kitchen window the orb did not move between 10 to 60 secs it went west in a straint line
content.summary: I saw the orb after coming up from my basement after watching tv show/movie with my mom and i just saw the orb out of the kitchen window

content.detailedDescription:
glowing light with a wierd moving trail seen above tel aviv. rapidly stopped, moved up and down unaturally, then escelated north in isane speed and diapeared as fast ad it came.
it was seeb that day in the judea desert and jerusalem.
content.summary: Glowing light with a trail

content.detailedDescription: My father, brother and i were watching the hale bopp comet and noticed a red star like. it got brighter and then grew to a big white spot in the sky. looked 100 times bigger than a star. it eventually got smaller and the craft slowly moved across the sky. it flew by us (10km away) at an elevation of about 3-500 feet high. it had three glowing lights on it, red, blue and green that circled around. we had a telescope out and spotted the object which didn't seem to have defined edges. looked like a mass of energy with three circular lights that spun at about 1 rotation per second. it flew in a completely straight path from what seemed to be outer space into close by earth. we were shocked and called the local airport to find out what it might have been. they reported no scheduled flights in our area. we lost sigh of the object when it flew past us 10-15 minutes after the first sighting.
content.summary: Bright red star, then white, then flew by us

content.detailedDescription:
Just finished doing the lighting for a local school christmas drama show that i was a student at. 
whilst walking down victoria road on my way home to rastrick, i noticed a strange light in the horizon. 
the object was very dark against the night sky, but had lighting all around it. the object was triangle shaped, and had different lights such as red, green, blue, white and yellow. that changed randomly, it also seemed these lights were not static on the craft but they seemed to move too. 
as soon as i spotted the object, it immediately came closer to where i was walking, almost directly overhead. from the horizon location to where it hovered overhead must have been 3 or more miles. the craft made this distance in a matter of seconds and then hovered. 

when trying to explain how long this craft hovered directly above me is very difficult. i cant describe if this was a matter of seconds or maybe 5 minutes or more. all i can remember is a strange feeling, and feeling like what the hell is this thing above me. after a period of time, the craft then shot off towards the blackly / ainley top area and disappeared, it took matter of seconds to get to this area again before it disappeared. 

from originally seeing it, to hovering and then changing direction and flying off the angle must of been around 110 degrees. 

as soon as it disappeared i remember questioning on what it could of been. totally disregarding it could of been a ufo, but the more i thought about this the more i couldn't answer what it could of been. 

no aircraft i knew of could fly so fast, hover and then change direction so quickly. 

i proceeded to make my way home. which involved a long walk up a steep dark hill. i called my parents at the bottom of the hill requesting they came to pick me up. at this stage i felt terrified in walking up this hill that i had walked up hundreds of times before. 

eventually my mum came to collect me, and wasn't happy. i told her the events that night and i was laughed at and wasn't taken seriously. probably thought i was making up stories to get a lift home. 

after going to bed for the night, and waking up in the morning. 
the first thing my mum said was sorry when i got up. 

when asking why, she informed me she had listened to the local radio station that evening, where they had a talk show phone in style show. 
apparently many people called in and had described the exact same sighting to the radio station, in fact that many people mentioned it that the presenter tried to contact air traffic control who confirmed they were no aircraft in that area at that time. 

i left a report on a website back in 1999 when this happened, but cannot find it at all online. 

i still remember all the details as if it happened right now, something i dont think ill ever forget. 

would love to hear from anyone who saw the same sighting, and also the reports on the local radio station.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark object with light seen near horizon and then almost over head in a few seconds, hovered for a number of seconds or could of been minutes and then changed direction and shot off and disappeared.
